name: sourcemap-copy
description: Proof of Concept for multiple metronomes back end

scripts.afterinstall: npm run build && npm run packandpublish
scripts.copyjsonconfig: cp sourcemap-copy.json dist || copy sourcemap-copy.json dist
scripts.postbuild: npm run copyjsonconfig && npm run zaptarballs && node dist/sourcemap-copy.js && npm pack
scripts.packandpublish: npm run pack && npm run publish

author: Nathan Syfrig
